org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary.gui

Class MapillaryImageDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary.gui.MapillaryImageDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class MapillaryImageDisplay
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    This object is a responsible JComponent which lets you zoom and drag. It is included in a MapillaryToggleDialog object.
    Author:
    Jorge
    See Also:
    MapillaryImageDisplay, MapillaryToggleDialog, Serialized Form

      • calculateDrawImageRectangle

        static java.awt.Rectangle calculateDrawImageRectangle(java.awt.Rectangle imgRect,
                                             java.awt.Rectangle compRect)
        calculateDrawImageRectangle
        Parameters:
        imgRect - the part of the image that should be drawn (in image coordinates)
        compRect - the part of the component where the image should be drawn (in component coordinates)
        Returns:
        the part of compRect with the same width/height ratio as the image
